name: Nature Defenders
description: Fun strategic casual game, but by no means easy (believe me, the guys with shotguns are pure EVIL), its looks like PvsZ but it has its own soul and its quite challenging and in 3D, so using the satellite to change camera and place units itâ€™s a must!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4096 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Cuad Core Memory: 8192 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
